boardgame.name: Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones: Second Tide
Ром и кости: Второй прилив
boardgame.description: Avast ye pirates! Gather your crews and set sail for adventure on the high seas in Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones: Second Tide!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on online MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) style games, Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones has 2-6 players taking control of legendary pirate heroes, each with unique powers and abilities, as their crews fight over Davy Jones' legendary treasure!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players each control up to five heroes at any time, moving them across the game board in an attempt to destroy various key features on their opponents' ship. Victory is obtained by destroying enough of these features. Your heroes are not alone, however, as your crew also consists of deckhands and bosuns who, while not controlled by the player, will work on a simple AI to wreak havoc on the enemy!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Of course, what would pirates be without plunder? And in Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones the most sought after treasure are Davy Jones' mythical pieces of eight! Players amass these powerful coins during gameplay to unleash devastating abilities and attacks from their Heroes, crushing all enemies before them until only they remain!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is both a stand-alone and compatible as an expansion to Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones. In Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones: Second Tide, 2 to 6 players will take control of one of two deadly pirate crews: The mysterious and monstrous Deep Lords, who seek to claim Davy Jones_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; treasure in an effort to flood the world and reshape it to their liking, or the Marea de la Muerte_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;cedil; a crew of ruthless gold-seeking Spanish cutthroats who will stop at nothing to claim the treasure for their own greed!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players control teams of three to five heroes, depending on the number of players, each with various and unique powers and abilities. These Heroes are drawn from five different classes, each with their own strengths and weaknesses:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Captains: Jack-of-all-Trade Heroes who specialize in buffing other Heroes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Brutes: The toughest of the tough, Brutes can take a ton of punishment and only get stronger for doing so!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gunner: Ranged damage dealers, Gunners have the lowest HP of all classes, but can also dish out the most hurt._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Swashbucklers: Like Gunners, Swashbucklers specialize in dealing damage, but prefer the up-close-and-personal approach._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Quartermaster: While they don't deal the most damage, Quartermasters make up for it in raw utility: specializing in healing and buffing Heroes, and also enhancing your Deckhands and Bosuns!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The most notable change to gameplay is their new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;dynamic Leveling System_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Now each Hero begins the game with their Basic Attack skill card. As they gain Coins, which are obtained from KO'ing enemies and Objectives, they can use those Coins to buy new skills, as well as level up existing skills! Also, they've introduced a new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Alternating Activation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; method of play where players will take turns activating 1 Hero (or their Crew), and then their opponent will do the same, continuing back and forth until everyone has gone._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Amazing game of ships, pirates, and sea beasts. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been instructed to turn the game room into a nursery, so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got to find a new home for this fantastic game. I am super sad to loose this game from my collection, as I have only played the base game twice and have yet to even open all the expansions and add-ons. As you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll see in the list below, this game offers so much for its price (I know it is a lot, but you are getting sooooo much!) Many of the items are kickstarter exclusives and will never be available in the retail market. Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/cmon/rum-and-bones-second-tide Included in this auction: Base Game Iron Inquisition Faction Blutrausch Legion Iron Inquisition Hero Pack Blutrausch Legion Hero Pack Fairy Tale Hero Pack Tuseteer Hero Pack Cutthroats Hero Pack League of Extraordinary Pirates Hero Pack Deep Lords Dice Marea de la Muerte Dice Plastic Coin Pack Plus 27 kickstarter stretch goals
